content: अनागत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न आगतः, न. त.] {@--1@} Not come or arrived; तावद्भयस्य भेतव्यं यावद्भयमनागतं <ls>H. 1. 57.</ls> {@--2@} Not got or obtained; वर्धिष्णुमाश्रयमनागतमभ्युपैति <ls>Śi. 5. 14</ls>; so °आर्तव. {@--3@} Future, to come; see compounds below. {@--4@} Not learnt or attained, unknown. --तं The future time, future; °तं यः कुरुते स शोभते <ls>Pt. 3. 164</ls> he shines (thrives, prospers) who provides for the future; अनागतवतीं चिंतामसंभाव्यां करोति यः <ls>Pt. 5. 71.</ls>
